attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current EMA system at colleges across the country is unfair. I am a student at worcetser college of technology. Myself and some of my friends to not recive finalcial help to study. It costs me £25 a week petrol as there is no transport where i live and £15 parking the current system is unfair. i myself will not beinfit from EMA now as i finish college soon but i feel others shouldnt have to go through what i have working so as i can study
